sentences.en: A car of comparable size would cost far more abroad.
sentences.cn: 同样大小的汽车在国外要贵得多。

sentences.en: A comparable house in the south of the city would cost twice as much.
sentences.cn: 一栋类似的房子位于城南部就要贵一倍的价钱。

sentences.en: Are these trends not comparable with Newton's law of inertia?
sentences.cn: 这些趋势难道和牛顿的惯性定律不是很相仿 吗 ?

sentences.en: At the same particle size, coarse or fine, performance is comparable.
sentences.cn: 只要颗粒相同, 不管是粗的,还是细的, 结果相同.

sentences.en: By contrast, the comparable figure for Canada is 16 percent.
sentences.cn: 对比之下，加拿大的可比数字是16%。

sentences.en: By contrast, the comparable figure for the Netherlands is 16 per cent.
sentences.cn: 相反，荷兰的相对数字为16%。

sentences.en: Digital priced the new line at less than half the cost of comparable mainframes.
sentences.cn: Digital公司新产品的定价比同类主机的一半还要低。

sentences.en: Farmers were meant to get an income comparable to that of townspeople.
sentences.cn: 农民的收入本应该与城里人的收入相当。

sentences.en: His handwriting is not bad, but it's hardly comparable with yours.
sentences.cn: 他的书法不错，但是很难和你的相比。

sentences.en: In other comparable countries, real wages increased much more rapidly.
sentences.cn: 在其他可比的国家里实际工资增长快得多。

sentences.en: It is significantly more compact than any comparable laptop, with no loss in functionality.
sentences.cn: 它比同类笔记本电脑小巧很多，但功能未减。

sentences.en: Outside New England, a comparable urbanity could be found.
sentences.cn: 新英格兰以外的地区也有相当典雅的作品.

sentences.en: Steady - state heat flow is comparable to the flow of an incompressible fluid.
sentences.cn: 稳态热流和不可压缩流体的流动可相比拟.

sentences.en: The achievements of an athlete and a writer are not comparable.
sentences.cn: 运动员的成就与作家的成就不能相提并论.

sentences.en: The higher value is comparable to those obtained in CVD epitaxy.
sentences.cn: 这个高的数值可以和从化学气相淀积外延得到的数值相比拟.

sentences.en: The music of Irving Berlin is scarcely comparable to that of Beethoven.
sentences.cn: 欧文·伯林的音乐很难与贝多芬的媲美.

sentences.en: The universe as a whole contains billions of comparable galaxies.
sentences.cn: 整个宇宙,包含亿万个可以比拟的银河系.

sentences.en: Weak indications of this link could be found with comparable cis - compounds.
sentences.cn: 在相应的顺 式 化合物中能够发现这个键的微弱反映.

words.tran_cn: 比较；对照；比喻；比较关系
可相比的,成比例的,类似的

phrases.tran_cn: 可比较的，比得上的；与…相容；可同…比较

trans.tran_en: similar to something else in size, number, quality etc, so that you can make a comparison
